name: Shipteroids
description:
Choose a ship and fly around and shoot things. Featuring:

  • 13 different types of ship, and counting
    • You can currently only choose one of three starting ships. Not sure yet how "unlocking" other ships will be implemented.
  • 2 weapons/abilities per ship
    • Some are straightforward, e.g. lasers and missiles
    • Some are fancy, e.g. when playing as the "swarm" ship, action #2 gathers your swarm-mates together, so that you can fly as a group.
  • Asteroids
  • Fuel, energy, & gold pickups
  • Other ships
    • 4 different "teams" (green/blue/red/yellow)
  • Robust physics engine
    • "Robust" here meaning "everything is circles bouncing off each other"
      • ...plus spring physics 👍
  • Multiple areas connected as a map
    • You travel between areas by "warping", and choosing your next destination when you reach branching points in the map
  • Planets (which do nothing yet... hmmmm)

In the future, there may come to be:

  • Smarter AI for computer-controlled ships
  • Music & sound effects
  • A way of buying upgrades with the gold you collect
  • Multiplayer?
  • More ships
